name: Timely Manor (Wil Bain)
description:
Our group itch page:

https://timely-manor.itch.io/timely-manor

Five missing teenagers. An abandoned manor. A time travelling detective. Think you can find the answers?

A game I created in a team of 10 as part of my final project while studying a bachelor of Game Design in 2022. I worked as the director, lead designer and lead writer on Timely Manor
